document.full_text: the tetris company, the maker of the game tetris, claimed on friday that the game broke a record after people paid for and downloaded it 132 million times on mobile devices.
document.title: tetris expands beyond gaming, and claims a new record
lines_and_colors: the tetris company, the maker of the game tetris, claimed on friday that the game broke a record after people paid for and downloaded it 132 million times on mobile devices.
